transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Customer: Hello?

Executive: Haan ji. Ji Joshi sir good afternoon.

Customer: Ji good afternoon.

Executive: Main Tanseef baat kar raha hu sir main IndiaMART se.

Customer: Ji boliye sir.

Executive: Badhiya hai ji aap bataye. Woh sir next day hum logo ki meet schedule hui thi lekin aapko call kiya tha toh sir aap busy the toh baat nahi ho payi humari.

Customer: Ji ji ji bataiye sir. Ji ji abhi hai system pe hai sir abhi aap?

Customer: Hmm haan system pe toh hu bataiye.

Executive: Dekhiye main ek virtual meet ka aapke official mail id pe link schedule kar raha hu.

Customer: Nahi woh aap mere ko kaam batao pehle kya kaam karna hai woh virtual meet ka theek hai koi dikkat nahi. Aap mere ko bataiye usme karna kya hai apne ko.

Executive: Maine aapko bataya tha na sir ki aapki jo category hai jis category mein aap deal kar rahe ho sir. Toh us category mein sir competition increase ho gaya aur dusre suppliers kis tarike se business kar rahe hain aur ek apna business le rahe hain proper tarike se woh main aapko show karna chahta hu jis se aap thoda sa relate kar pao cheezo ko sir.

Customer: Hmm hmm. Ji.

Customer: Achha theek hai theek hai theek hai.

Executive: Ji dekhiye aapke mail id pe maine just share kiya hai.

Customer: Kaunsi mail pe dala hai?

Executive: Aapka jo registered hai sir wahi ek minute main bata deta hu. Hotmail wali.

Executive: Sir yeh hai medisofpharma@hotmail.com.

Customer: Haan haan aa gaya aa gaya mere paas mein theek hai.

Executive: Ji ji.

Customer: Theek hai ho gaya.

Customer: Haan ji.

Customer: Haan voice aa rahi hai but woh us pe call pe call mute kar diya aapne?

Customer: System pe mere paas hai nahi na mic nahi hai mere paas camera aur mic nahi hai system pe.

Customer: Haan aap audio call unmute kar lo na audio call because mic aur woh nahi hai mere paas mein.

Executive: Abhi theek hai sir? Abhi aapko aawaz aa rahi hai?

Customer: Haan voice aa rahi hai mere paas mein woh us pe screen pe samne woh nahi hai mic aur camera nahi hai laptop se nahi main abhi desktop pe hu.

Executive: Achha achha achha koi baat nahi hai abhi toh matlab sahi hai na sir abhi communication mein koi problem toh nahi hai?

Customer: Abhi aa rahi hai haan nahi abhi voice aa rahi hai sir.

Executive: Theek hai sir. Dekhiye sabse pehle toh main apni screen aapko present kar raha hu sir.

Executive: Abhi visible hai sir aapko meri screen?

Customer: Hmm hmm hmm hmm.

Executive: Theek hai. Main sabse pehle aapko ek data dikhana chahta hu medisofpharma aapka maine open kiya hai yeh.

Executive: Ab yeh jo chart maine open kiya hua hai sir.

Executive: Yeh aapka December 2024 se leke abhi November 25 tak ka data hai aapka sir. Jisme aapne kitni leads consume kari hai aur kitni inquiries aapko aayi hai right?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Theek hai abhi main by lead ka sir section laga raha hu sir ki jitni aapne by leads consume kari hai. Toh December ke month mein agar aap dekh rahe honge toh number of by leads jo aapne consume kari hai woh around 27 by leads consume kari hai right?

Customer: Aur weekly mere paas hoti hai.

Executive: Aur uske baad January mein sir ji?

Customer: Weekly 20 hoti hai mere paas.

Executive: Ji weekly aapke paas 20 hoti hai daily two hoti hai. Haan monthly ho gayi 100.

Customer: Haan round round aap 20 se 25% consume ho gayi hai.

Executive: Haan 20 into four agar aap kar lenge yeh toh 80 toh yahi ho gayi. Month month ki 100 ho gayi na lagbhag.

Executive: Ji haan 100 se bhi upar ho gayi sir.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Ji toh aap dekhiye yeh hai aapka chart aapka.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: December month mein around 27 by lead consume kari hai January mein 35 Feb mein 36 March aur April mein sabse kam 20 aur 29 fir se aapne May mein aapki team ne 39 consume kari hai highest 47 kari hai August ke month mein. Theek hai?

Customer: Ji.

Executive: Yeh by leads ka ho gaya aur ab main direct inquiry kar raha hu sir. Ab direct inquiry ka haan ji inquiries woh ho gayi jo buyer aapko directly approach kar raha hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Toh January February aur December ke month mein around 123 buyers aapko December mein connect kiye the 144 January mein aur 144 February mein but March aur April se aapka yeh just half se bhi kam ho gaya. Hmm. Jo buyer aapko samne se approach kar rahe the ab yeh hamper hota hai do cheezo se sir. Pehla toh kya hua hai ki idhar last one year aur two year mein hamara jo client based raha hai TrustSeal ka sir woh kafi jyada increase kiya hai. Jo hamara client based tha pehle basic mein chal rahe the un logo ko kuch business milna expectation un logo ki high hui toh un logo ne hamari TrustSeal services mein opt kiya toh kahin na kahin by leads ek distribute hone lagi aur by lead ka distribution increase hua toh aapke paas jo by lead ka flow tha woh aata toh tha but kahin na kahin dusre suppliers agar usko consume kar lete hain toh woh aapke panel se sold out by leads ke section mein dikh jata hai aap samjho ki ek by leads hum IndiaMART jo hai four to five suppliers ko provide karte hain sir jo consume kar sakte hain jaise hi char buyers ne consume kari by leads automatically sir woh by leads sold out section mein chali jati hai kyunki woh ab koi aur sold out nahi kar sakta koi aur purchase nahi kar sakta hai right? Hmm. Ab dekhiye main aapko jo client based dikhana chah raha hu woh main yahan se aapko dikhata hu.

Executive: Abhi dekhiye PCD Pharma franchise aapka major category ka business hai jisme aap sabse jyada business chahte ho right?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Ab PCD Pharma franchise ki category main open kar raha hu sir yeh hamara IndiaMART ka all over India page hai. Jisme 1000 plus suppliers available hai koi bhi buyer agar search karta hai Google pe ya IndiaMART pe ki usko PCD Pharma franchise chahiye toh uske samne yeh wala page open hota hai ab isme aap dekhiyega sabse pehle ek Kenu biological karke company hai New Delhi ki PCD Pharma franchise in Brahmapur karke inhone dal rakha hai inko aap jante hain sir?

Customer: Haan Kenu biological haan janta hu inko.

Executive: Ji ji ab inhone haan Delhi ke hain toh aapka jo business matlab hai toh run toh aap log kar rahe ho Simrapur Himachal Pradesh se right? Toh head office wagera kahan hai aap logo ka wahi Himachal mein hai sir Simraur haan Himachal mein hi hai.

Executive: Achha achha toh aap sir kya aapne khud owner hai company ke ya aapne khud franchise le rakhi hai?

Customer: Owner hai sir owner.

Executive: Owner hai theek hai toh aap dekhiyega yeh company jo Kenu biological hai inhone apni listing ko top one mein rakha hai ab dekhiye inke paas jo badging lagi hui hai yeh ek industry leader ki badging lagi hogi sir. Industry leader services ke liye toh abhi matlab aap opt nahi kar sakte ho kyunki yeh sirf leader suppliers ko milti hai ab upar ke jo teen supplier hai ek SSR healthcare hai Nagpur ki company hai aur ek aur company hai Steris Life Science Private Limited Ahmedabad ki company hai in teeno company ne matlab apni listing ekdam top three listing mein all over India mein maintain kar rakhi hai inhone IndiaMART pe woh services le rakhi hai jisme inko hum top three mein present karte hain is category mein iske baad se aap dekhiyega dusri company aati hai Soul Care Pharmaceuticals Baddi Solan ki ab main aapko ek cheez dikhata hu inke paas kitna inquiry ka flow aata hai Kenu biological wale ke paas main inka GST yahan se copy kar raha hu Mr. Satish Otswal iske owner hai. Hmm. Main iska GST copy kar raha hu hamare panel mein taki inki puri details hamare mein dikh jayegi hamare zariye aati se.

Executive: Maine yahan copy kiya Kenu biological company ke owner hai Satish Otswal ab jaise maine aapka chart khola tha same chart main inka khol raha hu sir. Yeh chart hai inka December se leke November tak ka same aise aapka chart tha ab isme main sabse pehle toh by leads ka filter lagata hu. Hmm. By leads jo inhone consume kari hui hai sir December ke month mein 343 by lead consume kari hai January mein 298 Feb mein 238 abhi last month ki bhi agar baat kare October 25 ki sir toh inhone 266 by leads consume kari hui hai matlab ki catalog se flow hai inki team proper active rehti hai tab inhone consume kari hui hai ab inquiries aa jayegi yeh toh by leads ka paisa inhone toh diya hi hai main sabse jyada business in logo ko milta hai direct inquiry se sir January mein 1324 buyers ne inko approach kiya tha direct direct inquiry se business nahi milta sir direct inquiry se nahi milta business. Ji sir?

Executive: Toh matlab aapka aapne kabhi sir go through kiya hai kya matlab ki by leads aur direct inquiry kitni hai?

Customer: Haan bilkul bilkul kiya hai bhai sahab go through kiya hai direct inquiry se zero business milta hai. Zero business. Inquiries aati hai haan ji log aapko call karte hain approach karte hain business lagbhag na ke barabar milta hai direct inquiry se. Ji. Kyunki woh product jo hai product unko product ka demand chahiye hota hai items chahiye hoti hai hamari item pharmaceutical field hai koi jootha kapda nahi hai ki bhai haan inquiry direct ki aur jootha kharid liya kapda kharid liya pharmaceutical mein aise nahi hota bhai sahab.
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants to know the purpose of virtual meet.

- States direct inquiries yield zero business.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the purpose of virtual meet.

- Executive shared data on buyleads and direct inquiries.

- Executive explained the importance of TrustSeal.



Next Steps: 

None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, direct inquiry, trustseal, pcd pharma franchise
